text: Enoch Araujo Sánchez (born 26 March 1949) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Chiapas. He was also Mayor of Tuxtla Gutiérrez from 1995 to 1998. == See also == * 1995, Chiapas state election * List of municipal presidents of Tuxtla Gutiérrez ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Tuxtla Gutiérrez Category:Politicians from Chiapas Category:Mayors of places in Mexico Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:20th-century Mexican politicians Category:Municipal presidents in Mexico
title: Enoch Araujo Sánchez
